price: Alipo mwambia baba yake na kaumu yake: Mnaabudu nini?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَا تَعۡبُدُونَ
footnotes: Alipo mwambia baba yake: Mnaabudu kitu gani hichi, ambacho hakifai kuabudiwa? Anakusudia kwa hayo kuyakebehi masanamu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: idh qāla li-abīhi waqawmihi mā taʿbudūna
